data.title: Blake Lively & Ryan Reynolds set to join Hollywood's billionaires club
data.meta_description: Hollywood stars Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are believed to be worth a combined $500million with some lucrative business deals and Wrexham FC's success could catapult them into an entirely new league.
data.text:
Met Gala 2022: Blake Lively poses with Ryan Reynolds

Blake Lively, 35, and Ryan Reynolds, 46, share four children and a multi-million dollar net worth after a decade of marriage.

The A-list couple have made a multitude of ingenious business decisions, including launching their own business, brands and investments that, if they all pay off, could see them joining the ranks of Hollywood’s elusive billionaires.

The club includes world-renowned stars and household names like Oprah Winfrey, Steven Spielberg and Rihanna.

As the saying goes, it takes money to make money, so what did the couple start with as they now stare down a potential ten-figure net worth?

Quite simply the movie stars began with a similar-sized paycheque as their peers for their blockbuster hits.

READ MORE: Tony Blackburn cancels all work as illness turns out to be more serious than first thought

Unarguably Ryan’s most well-known, and well-paid, role is the Marvel antihero Deadpool in the iconic 2016 film and the character’s following sequels and cameos.

The actor is believed to have earned $2million upfront for his role in the first film but negotiated a large share of backend points, which earned him over $22million through its unexpected popularity and his paycheques have only grown ever since.

In 2020, the actor more than proved his worth as a Hollywood star when Forbes listed him as the second highest-paid actor with a net worth of $106million.

Similarly, his wife Blake started her career at just 20 years old in what would become an iconic role in the Gossip Girl series, earning an estimated $60,000 per episode by the end of the show according to Cosmopolitan.

Don't miss...

Sue Cleaver looks ‘20 years younger’ after weight loss transformation [PICTURES]

Linda Lewis dies at age of 72 as family pay tribute [TRIBUTES]

Bobby Davro's fiancée Vicky Wright dies after cancer battle [LATEST]

Following her lengthy stint on television the actress veered into films, although The Things reported her highest-earning film yet is the 2011 Box Office flop Green Lantern, where she met her husband.

However, off-set the actress evidently has an acute mind for business, earning the role of ambassador for countless brands such as Gucci for which she was rumoured to get a $3.8milion salary.

Much like Ryan, the mother-of-four has embarked on multiple investment deals and launched her own range of drinks, Betty Buzz

Ryan’s most notorious business deal in 2020, buying over Wrexham FC for a cool $2.5million, drew some speculation as it was then a relatively unknown National League club but it has more than proven its worth since.

Invalid email

We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you've consented to and to improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and 3rd parties based on our understanding. You can unsubscribe at any time. Read our Privacy Policy

Wrexham’s recent promotion undoubtedly to the Football League earned both Ryan and his co-owner Rob McElhenney a fair pay rise but it’s not just on the pitch where the club is earning its dues.

The two actors utilised their Hollywood know-how and connections to launch the Disney+ series Welcome to Wrexham, following the team’s journey under its new leaders and earning £4million in just one season according to North Wales Live.

It has also been reported Ryan has his mind set on taking over other sports teams following Wrexham’s sensational victory.

He is believed to be joining a group which will submit a hefty £795million bid to buy Ottawa Senators, a National Hockey League team in Canada.

Outside of sports, Ryan’s own drink brand Aviation American Gin has also catapulted his net worth when it entered into a deal with Diageo reportedly paying an upfront fee of $340million but could be worth up to $619million, according to Mail Online.
